name: Mr. Dog
quote: We have two lives, and the second begins when we realize we only have one. - Confucius
title: Senior

name: Doggy Dog
quote: Words are, in my not-so-humble opinion, our most inexhaustible source of magic. Capable of both inflicting injury, and remedying it. - Professor Dumbledore
title: Middle

name: True Dog
quote: It is impossible to begin to learn that which one thinks one already knows. - Epictetus
title: Junior
